header.title: User Blog Mod
header.description: Adds Blogs to a phpBB3 board.
header.author-notes: PHP versions less than 5.1.0 are NOT supported. Please report any bugs/problems at my website: http://www.lithiumstudios.org. The SVN repository for this project is: http://userblogmod.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ You may check for updated code in the repository, but the latest files in the repository may be broken and have major errors.

changelog.change: Changing the way the BLOG_USE_ROOT is handled in the blog/includes/functions.php file. Now the variable must be named BLOG_ROOT, and it takes a string holding the path from your server's root path.
Fixing the (previously broken) output ordering of plugins.
Moving the hardcodded < PHP 5.1.0 error string to the setup.php language file.
Changing the way the SQL query is handled in blog_data.php. Now the $sql_where is put in $sql_ary['WHERE'] to match the rest of the SQL code.
Changing the credits text. Now it is "Blogs powered by User Blog Mod © EXreaction" instead of "Blog System powered by User Blog Mod © EXreaction"
To update from RC2, upload all of the new files, then run the upgrade script at blog.php?page=update.
Adding an uninstaller. You can now uninstall the stuff added in the database by going to blog/uninstall.php and following it's instructions.
Outputting the blog link and text to PROFILE_BLOG, and the link to U_VIEW_BLOG in the parent block as well with add_blog_links.
Adding a new option in the ACP to disable showing the blog link in the Custom Profile Fields in view topic/view profile.
Fixing a potential bug that could affect some browsers when trying to submit the UCP form.
Fixing the bug with the smilies popup in the UCP for subsilver2 (http://www.lithiumstudios.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=41&t=683)
Fixing a hole where users could rate items higher or lesser than the max/min allowed rating.
Fixing the alt text on rating images.

Fixing a minor overlook which resulted in a big problem with EAMI. When updating, you should also run this (there is a note about this in the update instructions as well): http://www.lithiumstudios.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=691
NOTE FOR TRANSLATORS: 2 new language fields have been added in the mods/blog/acp.php file.
To update from 1.0.0 follow the instructions in contrib/update/100_to_101.xml.

action-group.diy-instructions:
Go to yoursite/blog/install.php in your web browser to install the database section.
Go to ACP->Styles->Style components->Theme, then hit the Refresh button next to prosilver.
Set the user/group permissions and configuration settings.
